name: LearnShapes
0:
”Alexa, open learn shapes”
”Alexa, start learn shapes”
”Alexa, play learn shapes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learn shapes
des: Learn shapes creates a differentiator by supporting the beginners and advanced kids in learning shapes. Kids may benefit from playing the game again by increase in speed and confidence with shapes. It is like a word game to learn and practice shapes. Being able to identify differences and similarities also increases analytical skills.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
